title: big RAM
body: Some new mobo - K8D Master 3 - from MSI supports up to <a href="http://www.msi.com.tw/program/newsrelease/news_page.php?UID=274">24GB of RAM</a>.  Pretty sweet, but too bad that much RAM would <a href="http://www.pricewatch.com/">cost $4908 (at today's prices)</a>.
bodyArticleHtml:
2004-03-15

bodyNavItems.text: There is no emoticon for what I'm feeling now!
